variable.name: r_viewmodelSize
variable.description: This allows you to change the size of the viewmodel (the model of your active weapon displayed on the center of your screen) a little, useful if you prefer to use "r_drawviewmodel 1" and higher fov values (for demos for example). For "fov 110" you could try "r_viewmodelscale 0.8" or 0.85 for example.
